site_title: Ready For Takeoff by Didier Boursin

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is Paper plane 20 of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. Ready For Takeoff by Didier Boursin. This is an origami plane folded from a square sheet. If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 019 : Origami Delta by Gary J. Hinze", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/Gmjole56crs Here at Heap Art, we are trying to help you practice origami on a regular bases. Every week I will select a minimum of 2 origami models and show you how to fold it. If you like origami and paper airplanes -- Please use the following link to subscribe to my channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/heapart?sub_confirmation=1 My Upload Schedule: Tuesday : A new Paper Airplane, part of my 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge Friday : A new Origami Model never seen before on my channel Thanks for watching.
